sentences.en: Because I wish I can respire the natural fresh air during exercise , which is more health and benefit to my body.
sentences.cn: 因为我喜欢在运动的同时能呼吸到大自然的清新空气，这样更健康，更有益。

sentences.en: For the intelligent power is no less diffused in all parts and pervades all things for him who is willing to draw it to him than the aerial power for him who is able to respire it.
sentences.cn: 因为理智力对于愿意利用它的人来说，就跟大气对于能够呼吸它的人一样，也是分布于所有部分和浸淫于所有事物的。

sentences.en: He also discovered that plants respire in the same way as animals, taking up oxygen and giving out carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 另外，他还发现了植物拥有和动物相同的呼吸方式，即吸收氧气并释放出二氧化碳。

sentences.en: Sensitive varieties apprently respire mainly by the glycolysis pathway whereas resistant varieties depend more on the pentose phosphate pathway.
sentences.cn: 显然敏感品种的呼吸主要通过糖酵解途径，而抗性品种比较依赖戊糖磷酸途径。

sentences.en: Some products, such as asparagus, corn, and strawberries, respire at a higher rate than other products, such as apples, oranges, and potatoes.
sentences.cn: 一些农产品，比如芦笋、玉米和草莓，与其它农产品（如苹果、桔子和马铃薯）相比，其呼吸速率较大。

words.tran_cn: 口罩；[医] 呼吸器；防毒面具

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸，呼气和吸气，（植物）进行呼吸
